title: Slave Again
description: She traded in her prison uniform for shackles of a different kind. After escaping a North Korean prison camp, Mee-Kyong is hustled over the border and sold into the Chinese underworld. She vows to survive, but sheer determination and willpower won’t save her this time. Is she fated to remain a slave forever? Slave Again is written by Christian suspense novelist Alana Terry, winner of numerous awards, including the Women of Faith writing contest and the Readers’ Favorite gold medal for religious fiction. It is offered at this special introductory price for a limited time. * This book has some Christian characters and themes but was written with a broad audience in mind.
author: Alana Terry
